hackathon-description-text: You know how legacy authentication thats gives one-time-passcodes (via SMS or app) have been hacked? And that phishing attacks on these types of 2FA offerings and other credential harvesting, cause 90% of all major hacks? Well, CryptoPhoto's next generation authentication solution blocks phishing, and is fast and simple to use.
hackathon-eligibility: Employees of Devpost, and contractors currently under contract work for Devpost are eligable!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: We are looking for the best application of our solution across a website and the way it is described to your users: such as how it is introduced, how it is positioned, how it is explained and how many of your users have started using it!!!!
Judges choice: We have 3 judges who will be looking for sites who best utilize and present the CryptoPhoto Solution! Judges will collectively chose 10 sites.
Judges choice: We have 3 judges who will be looking for sites who best utilise and present the CryptoPhoto Solution!

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: We are looking for the best application of our solution across a website and the way it is described to your users/ UX description: such as how it is introduced, how it is positioned, how it is explained and how many of your users have started using it!
We are looking for constructive feedback and suggestions to improve the UX (i.e. enrolment) and UX/UI for the API.

hackathon-description-header: Add 10x Simpler, 10x Faster and 10x More Secure Authentication to your Apps, Websites and Other Applications using CryptoPhoto
